short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a temporary fix to add custom css to facebook.com to fix an issue with zwj not rendering correctly in facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a temporary fix to add custom css to facebook.com to fix an issue with zwj not rendering correctly in facebook.

Facebook renders zwj inside a span. This causes languages like Sinhala to not render text correctly. This extension injects css to remove the span by setting display: contents on the spans.

Check screenshots for an example.

source: https://github.com/thilinag/fix-sinhala-facebook
